title: Narrow One
description: A unique multiplayer first-person archery game with a minimalist art style. Compete in team-based capture-the-flag matches using bow and arrow as your primary weapon. Features multiple character classes, maps, and strategic gameplay focused on precision and teamwork.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to sprint. Hold left mouse button to draw your bow and release to shoot. Right-click to zoom/aim. Press Q/E to switch abilities. On mobile, use the virtual joystick and on-screen buttons. Work with your team to capture the enemy flag while defending your own.
